verses.verseString: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنْذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.verseStringB: We sent Noah to his people: “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes upon them.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
verses.verseStringB: He said, “O my people, I am a clear warner to you.

verses.verseString: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.verseStringB: Worship Allah, and reverence Him, and obey me.

verses.verseString: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ مِنْ ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.verseStringB: He will forgive you of your sins, and He will delay you until a stated time. Allah’s time cannot be postponed once it has arrived—if you only knew.”

verses.verseString: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: He said, “My Lord, I have called my people night and day.

verses.verseString: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: But my call added only to their flight.

verses.verseString: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.verseStringB: And whenever I called them to Your forgiveness, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves with their clothes, and insisted, and became more and more arrogant.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Then I called them openly.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنْتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Then I appealed to them publicly, and I spoke to them privately.

verses.verseString: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: I said, ‘Ask your Lord for forgiveness; He is Forgiving.

verses.verseString: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِدْرَارًا
verses.verseStringB: He will let loose the sky upon you in abundant rain.

verses.verseString: وَيُمْدِدْكُمْ بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَلْ لَكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.verseStringB: And will supply you with wealth and children, and will give you gardens, and will give you rivers.

verses.verseString: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.verseStringB: What is the matter with you, that you do not hope for Allah with dignity?

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Although He created you in stages.

verses.verseString: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.verseStringB: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens in layers?

verses.verseString: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: And He placed the moon in their midst for light, and He made the sun a lamp.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ أَنْبَتَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.verseStringB: And Allah germinated you from the earth like plants.

verses.verseString: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: Then He will return you into it, and He will bring you out again.

verses.verseString: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.verseStringB: And Allah made the earth a spread for you.

verses.verseString: لِتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.verseStringB: So that you may travel its diverse roadways.’”

verses.verseString: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَنْ لَمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Noah said, “My Lord, they have defied me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in loss.”

verses.verseString: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: And they schemed outrageous schemes.

verses.verseString: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.verseStringB: And they said, “Do not give up your gods; do not give up Wadd, nor Souwa, nor Yaghoos, Yaooq, and Nassr.

verses.verseString: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.verseStringB: They have misled many, so increase the wrongdoers only in confusion.”

verses.verseString: مِمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُمْ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنْصَارًا
verses.verseStringB: Because of their wrongs, they were drowned, then hurled into a Fire, and they found none to help them against Allah.

verses.verseString: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: And Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever on earth.

verses.verseString: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.verseStringB: If You leave them, they will mislead your worshipers, and breed nothing but immoral unbelievers.

verses.verseString: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَنْ دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.verseStringB: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home in faith, and the believing men and believing women, and do not increase the wrongdoers except in ruin.”
